Changelog

This page documents the history of changes for each version of private-pgm.

Version X.Y.Z (Upcoming Release)

  • New Feature: …

  • Improvement: …

  • Bug Fix: …

Version 0.1.0 (Initial Release) - YYYY-MM-DD

  • Initial release of private-pgm.

  • Core functionalities:

    • Dataset and Domain handling (mbi.dataset, mbi.domain).

    • Basic PGM structures (mbi.graphical_model, mbi.factor).

    • Implementation of [Mechanism A] and [Mechanism B].

    • Synthetic data generation (mbi.synthetic_data).

  • Example scripts for toy data and Adult dataset.

  • Initial test suite.

Note

Keep this file updated with each new release, detailing new features, bug fixes, breaking changes, and other notable modifications. List the most recent versions at the top.
